'''''The Stellar Moments Vol. 4''''' is the fourth character [[soundtrack]] album for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features a total of 26 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, all original compositions for the following characters: [[Alhaitham]], [[Baizhu]], [[Charlotte]], [[Dehya]], [[Faruzan]], [[Freminet]], [[Furina]], [[Kaveh]], [[Kirara]], [[Lynette]], [[Lyney]], [[Mika]], [[Neuvillette]], [[Wanderer]], [[Wriothesley]], and [[Yaoyao]].

The album was first announced on December 8, 2023, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 4.3]]. The tracklist was announced on January 16, 2024 and the album was later released on January 17.<ref>Sina Weibo: [https://weibo.com/6593199887/NC6kpuZsy {{zh|「《原神》第四张角色主题OST即将上线」}}]</ref>
